short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Directors Desk SecureView extension for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Directors Desk SecureView Digital Rights Management (DRM) solution uses state-of-the-art technology to apply
customized security controls to each and every document. These controls include the ability to restrict printing, copy and
paste, screen capture, and saving, prevents unauthorized forwarding of the document and more. 

The Directors Desk SecureView Chrome Extension allows Chrome users to directly open and interact with this viewer from links within the DD application on the Chrome Browser.
